channel.title: Run Defender!
channel.description: Does anyone know how I change the rune dagger into the shield spot so it looks like a defender? And does any one know how to change the strength bonus on it?

item.title: Run Defender!
item.dc:creator: @Tr1pl3k1ll Tr1pl3k1ll
item.description:
@Tr1pl3k1ll wrote:

There is no way to get them into the left hand (sheild spot) it will show that it is, but it will still be in the same hand as your weapon. Also to change the bonus to the item there is a tut for it… I will try to find.

  • Tr1pl3k1ll

Read full topic

item.title: Run Defender!
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

This is very easy.

Go to Item , item1 depends on what source.

Open it.

Look for public static int shields

Add the daggers ID into the line of shields.

Note: Just incase search for Rune daggers ID in the top, that could be why it doesn’t go into the shield spot.

Read full topic
